lines.p:
Hear, O God, my cry for help.
Do pay attention to my prayer.

From the ends of the earth I will cry out to youWhen my heart is in despair.
Lead me onto a rock that is higher than I am.
For you are my refuge,A strong tower that protects me from the enemy.
I will be a guest in your tent forever;I will take refuge in the shelter of your wings. (Selah)

For you, O God, have heard my vows.
You have given me the inheritance belonging to those who fear your name.
You will add days to the life of the king,And his years will be from generation to generation.
He will sit enthroned forever before God;Grant him loyal love and faithfulness, so that these may safeguard him.
Then I will sing praises to your name foreverAs I pay my vows day after day.
